      • setCurrentPlayer

        public void setCurrentPlayer​(common.receivers.IRoomMember player)
        Sets the current player whose turn it is. This should be called with the next player at the end of the turn, before this GameState is sent to all players.
        Parameters:
        player - the player whose turn it is
